API reference¶

class packerlabimaging.Experiment(date: str, comments: str, dataPath: str, analysisSavePath: str, microscope: str, expID: str, TrialsInformation: MutableMapping[str, packerlabimaging.ExperimentMain.TrialsInformation], useSuite2p: bool = False, s2pResultsPath: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

A class to initialize and store data of an imaging experiment. This class acts as a bucket to contain information about individual trial objects.

add_trial(trial_id: str, total_frames_stitched: int, trials_information: Optional[packerlabimaging.ExperimentMain.TrialsInformation] = None)[source]¶

Create and add a trial object to the experiment.

trial_id total_frames_stitched trials_information

load_trial(trialID: str)[source]¶

method for importing individual trial objects from Experiment instance using the trial id for a given trial

property pkl_path¶

path in Analysis folder to save pkl object

save_pkl(pkl_path: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

saves packerlabimaging Experiment object using Pickle library (.pkl file extension).

Parameters

pkl_path – full .pkl s2pResultsPath for saving the Experiment object.

property tiff_path_dir¶

retrieve the parent directory of the provided tiff_path

update_suite2p(trialID: Optional[str] = None, s2pResultsPath: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

trialID s2pResultsPath

object

class packerlabimaging.TwoPhotonImagingTrial(metainfo: dict, analysis_save_path: str, microscope: str = 'Bruker', paq_options: Optional[dict] = None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Just two photon imaging related functions - currently set up for data collected from Bruker microscopes and suite2p processed Ca2+ imaging data

create_anndata()[source]¶

Creates annotated data (see anndata library for more information on AnnotatedData) object based around the Ca2+ matrix of the imaging trial.

property date¶

date of the experiment datacollection

meanRawFluTrace()[source]¶

Collects the raw mean of FOV fluorescence trace across the t-series.

Returns

mean fluorescence trace

property pkl_path¶

path in Analysis folder to save pkl object

plotSingleImageFrame(frame_num: int = 0, title: Optional[str] = None)[source]¶

plots an image of a single specified tiff frame after reading using tifffile. :param frame_num: frame # from 2p imaging tiff to show (default is 0 - i.e. the first frame) :param title: (optional) give a string to use as title :return: matplotlib imshow plot

class packerlabimaging.AllOpticalTrial(metainfo: dict, naparm_path: str, analysis_save_path: str, microscope: str, paq_options: Optional[dict] = None, prestim_sec: float = 1.0, poststim_sec: float = 3.0, pre_stim_response_window: float = 0.5, post_stim_response_window: float = 0.5, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class provides methods for All Optical experiments

STAProcessing(plane)[source]¶

Make stimulus triggered average (STA) traces and calculate the STA amplitude of response

Input:

plane - imaging plane n

avg_stim_images(peri_frames: int = 100, stim_timings: list = [], save_img=False, to_plot=False, verbose=False, force_redo=False)[source]¶

Outputs (either by saving or plotting, or both) images from raw t-series TIFF for a trial around each individual stim timings.

Parameters

  • stim_timings –

  • save_img –

  • to_plot –

  • force_redo –

  • verbose –

Returns

calculate_SLMTarget_SuccessStims(hits_df, process: str, stims_idx_l: list, exclude_stims_targets: dict = {})[source]¶

uses outputs of calculate_SLMTarget_responses_dff to calculate overall successrate of the specified stims

Parameters

  • hits_df – pandas dataframe of targets x stims where 1 denotes successful stim response (0 is failure)

  • stims_idx_l – ls of stims to use for this function (useful when needing to filter out certain stims for in/out of sz)

  • exclude_stims_targets – dictionary of stims (keys) where the values for each stim contains the targets that should be excluded from counting in the analysis of Success/failure of trial

:return

reliability_slmtargets: dict; reliability (% of successful stims) for each SLM target traces_SLMtargets_successes_avg: np.array; photostims avg traces for each SLM target (successful stims only)

collect_traces_from_targets(curr_trial_frames: list, reg_tif_folder: Optional[str] = None, save: bool = True)[source]¶

uses registered tiffs to collect raw traces from SLM target areas

get_SLMTarget_responses_dff(process: str, threshold=10, stims_to_use: Optional[list] = None)[source]¶

calculations of dFF responses to photostimulation of SLM Targets. Includes calculating reliability of slm targets, saving success stim locations, and saving stim response magnitudes as pandas dataframe.

Parameters

  • threshold – dFF threshold above which a response for a photostim trial is considered a success.

  • stims_to_use – ls of stims to retrieve photostim trial dFF responses

Returns

get_alltargets_stim_traces_norm(process: str, targets_idx: Optional[int] = None, subselect_cells: Optional[list] = None, pre_stim=15, post_stim=200, filter_sz: bool = False, stims: Optional[list] = None)[source]¶

primary function to measure the dFF and dF/setdF trace SNIPPETS for photostimulated targets. :param stims: :param targets_idx: integer for the index of target cell to process :param subselect_cells: ls of cells to subset from the overall set of traces (use in place of targets_idx if desired) :param pre_stim: number of frames to use as pre-stim :param post_stim: number of frames to use as post-stim :param filter_sz: whether to filter out stims that are occuring seizures :return: lists of individual targets dFF traces, and averaged targets dFF over all stims for each target

property naparm_path¶

setting location of naparm files that specify the photostimulation experiment setup

property paths¶

TODO returns a dictionary of all paths associated with trial

photostimProcessingAllCells(plane: int = 0)[source]¶

Take dfof trace for entire timeseries and break it up in to individual trials, calculate the mean amplitudes of response and statistical significance across all trials

Inputs:

plane - imaging plane n

property post_stim_frames¶

num frames for collecting Flu trace after each photostimulation trial (units: frames)

property post_stim_response_frames_window¶

num frames for collecting Flu trace after each photostimulation trial (units: frames)

property post_stim_test_slice¶

num of poststim frames used for quantification of photostim responses

property pre_stim_frames¶

num frames for collecting Flu trace after each photostimulation trial (units: frames)

property pre_stim_response_frames_window¶

num frames for measuring Flu trace before each photostimulation trial during photostim response measurement (units: frames)

property pre_stim_test_slice¶

num of prestim frames used for quantification of photostim responses

run_stamm_nogui(numDiffStims, startOnStim, everyXStims, preSeconds=0.75, postSeconds=1.25)[source]¶

run STAmoviemaker for the self’s trial

s2pMaskStack(pkl_list, s2p_path, parent_folder, force_redo: bool = False)[source]¶

makes a TIFF stack with the s2p mean image, and then suite2p ROI masks for all cells detected, target cells, and also SLM targets as well?

statisticalProcessingAllCells()[source]¶

Runs statistical processing on photostim response arrays

property timeVector¶

vector of frame times in milliseconds rather than frames
